chara.textHome: My name is Tsukasa Amane!

Um, this'll be a quick intro, but I'm
Tsukuyo's younger twin sister.

I live with my dad and his students at the
bamboo studio in Kosho Ward that he runs.

I'm fine living with only guys,
but lately I've been losing my temper at
being forced to handle all the chores...
hee hee.

Yaaay! Just what I've always wanted...
a brand-new electric bicycle!
Now all my chores won't be so bad!

Flute of mine, let your song echo ever
farther!
Now I really can help Tsukuyo out!

Dad is scary...but I really admire the way
his smile can brighten a room.

That's why I smile to get through
the tough times.
Tsukuyo puts up with so much all the time!
That's why I decided to stay upbeat.

If my cheery grin can lighten her
load at all, that's all the thanks
I'd ever need.
Oh, you're here!

These bags are so heavy,
think you can help me out?

Everyone back home eats so much,
even just buying food can be tiring.

Mornings are so hectic. 
I have to put the newspaper by my dad's seat,
prepare everyone's breakfast,

and then wake them up when it's ready.
It's almost like I'm running a B&B.

Lunchtime...
I wonder if Tsukuyo is eating in an
empty classroom again?

Thinking about that makes me realize
I'm lucky to have so many friends.

I'm counting on you, new electric bike!
I have to take advantage of these
evening sales,

so I can make a delicious meal
for the apprentices.

I've lived in this big place
ever since I was born.

It's all boys, so I still get a little nervous
doing some things like taking a bath...

See this wooden brooch?
I've been working on it in my spare time.

*Giggle* 
You already noticed?

I'm making matching ones for
me and Tsukuyo.
It's almost time for some Witch-hunting.
Oh, don't worry about me.
I made sure to finish all of my chores first.

Even if I ran into a copy of Tsukuyo,
I'd see right through it.

Thanks to our wish, that's how close
our bond has become.

There's this store on my shopping route,
it's one of my favorite places.

The wooden accessories they sell
are so cute. I use their designs as
inspiration when making stuff.
Sorry, I don't have any time to hang out!

I can't help it with the way
things are at home.

I always go to this one butcher shop
that sells cheap and delicious meat...

The thing is, sometimes I feel like
I see Yachiyo Nanami there too.

There's actually something I've always
longed to do...
I want to sleep in a bed one day.

That's right... I want to have a nice,
deep sleep, not on a mattress on the floor,
but in a western style bed.

I understand why my mom left
the bamboo trade.

I'm surprised she lasted in this
male-dominated world for that long...

I always got the impression from
my dad that I wasn't an only child.
Still, I can't believe I really have a sisterâ€¦

Tsukuyo and I treasure the flutes that
held our secret.

It's the one thing my father did
that I'm thankful for.

What good would it do you to hear
about the Wings of the Magius?

If you knew the truth,
you'd understand,

but I'm sorry... I don't have the authority
to talk to you about them.

*Sigh* I want to just leave this house, 
so I can be a normal girl and
live with Tsukuyo.
Let the performance begin!
Great job, everyone!
It's all thanks to the smiles!

Our performance is over.
Thank you very much!
You don't need an encore, right?
I'm Tsukasa Amane!

I'm always busy, so I don't really get time
to myself other than late at night.

But I can cheer anyone up with a song
from my flute and a big smile!
Great to meet you!

Hard work, a little pep,
and I'll never let Tsukuyo down!

This is all because I'm cheerful
and will never let myself get down!

Should I tell you a story to the
sound of my flute?

...Wait, I can't play and speak
at the same time.
Shopping's a cinch now that I've got a bike!

It's got baskets on all sides,
so I can get enough food for 10,
no problem!
There, enough ingredients for 10!
Phew...

the guys eat so much that buying food
for them all at once is a real challenge.
But I won't give up!
